recipesJson.name: PDQ
recipesJson.author: SixStrings952
recipesJson.description:
This is simple, as well as delicious! MUST use Liquid Barn Vanilla Ice Cream!
  

Heat steep 2-3 hours. Great after that, but way better the 3rd day!! Very flavorful & creamy! MAX VG recommended!
  
Please do not use this recipe for commercial gain.
  
#EJM

reviews.text: Out of the many S&C type recipes Ive tried, this is by far the best! Good call on these percentages and LB Vanilla IC
